Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Joseph Wells III
Reviews.Content: Wanted to get the mic to cut out the wind noise. Works perfect and easy to place in the helmet

Reviews.Title: Microphone works great in my car with no wind noise
Reviews.Author: Robert Joe
Reviews.Content: I have a Drift Ghost HD with this MIC located behind the passenger seat 4 inches above the floor of my MX5 (Miata). It picks up the sound of the exhaust nicely with no wind noise.

ProductInfo.Features:
Boost the audio quality of your POV footage
Improves sound quality and achieves more targeted audio for high-quality footage with impressive sound
Simply connect this external mic to the rear of your Drift HD Ghost camera (3.5mm plug)
Eliminate wind noise
Capture in-helmet commentary, record interviews and much more
